name: Barbell Bench Press
instructions: Lie flat on bench, lower bar to chest, press up explosively

name: Incline Dumbbell Press
instructions: Set bench to incline, press dumbbells up and together

name: Decline Bench Press
instructions: Set bench to decline, press bar to lower chest

name: Cable Chest Fly
instructions: Stand between cable stations, bring handles together in arc motion

name: Dumbbell Chest Fly
instructions: Lie on bench, arms extended, lower dumbbells in arc motion

name: Push-up
instructions: Body straight, lower until chest touches ground, push back up

name: Machine Chest Press
instructions: Sit in machine, push handles forward, return with control

name: Barbell Bent Over Row
instructions: Bend at hips, row bar to chest, focus on squeezing shoulder blades

name: Pull-ups
instructions: Grip bar wider than shoulders, pull chin over bar, lower with control

name: Lat Pulldown
instructions: Sit down, grip bar wider than shoulders, pull to chest

name: Dumbbell Single Arm Row
instructions: Row one arm at a time, pull elbow back, squeeze shoulder blade

name: Seated Row Machine
instructions: Sit facing machine, pull handles toward chest, squeeze back

name: Face Pull
instructions: High cable, pull rope toward face, flare elbows out

name: Conventional Deadlift
instructions: Feet shoulder-width, grip bar, drive through heels, straighten fully

name: Military Press
instructions: Stand upright, press bar from shoulders overhead, control descent

name: Lateral Raise
instructions: Arms at sides, raise dumbbells to shoulder height with slight bend

name: Reverse Fly Machine
instructions: Sit in machine, pull handles outward and backward

name: Arnold Press
instructions: Start with palms facing, press overhead rotating palms away

name: Barbell Shrug
instructions: Hold bar, shrug shoulders up toward ears, squeeze at top

name: Barbell Curl
instructions: Stand tall, curl bar to shoulder, lower with control

name: Dumbbell Curl
instructions: Alternate arms, curl to shoulder, keep elbows still

name: Hammer Curl
instructions: Hold dumbbells neutral grip, curl up, great for forearms too

name: Cable Curl
instructions: Low cable, curl bar to shoulder, constant tension

name: Tricep Dips
instructions: Support on bars, lower body by bending elbows, press back up

name: Tricep Rope Pushdown
instructions: High cable, push rope down, fully extend arms

name: Skull Crushers
instructions: Lie on bench, lower bar behind head, extend arms up

name: Close Grip Bench Press
instructions: Hands closer than shoulder-width, press bar to lower chest

name: Overhead Tricep Extension
instructions: Hold dumbbell overhead, lower behind head, extend back up

name: Barbell Back Squat
instructions: Bar on upper back, squat deep, drive through heels

name: Leg Press
instructions: Sit in machine, push platform away, lower with control

name: Leg Extension
instructions: Sit in machine, extend legs fully, squeeze quads

name: Dumbbell Lunge
instructions: Step forward, lower back knee, push back to start

name: Walking Lunge
instructions: Step forward alternating legs, keep torso upright

name: Bulgarian Split Squat
instructions: Rear foot elevated on bench, squat front leg

name: Romanian Deadlift
instructions: Hip hinge, bar stays close, feel hamstring stretch

name: Lying Leg Curl
instructions: Lie face down, curl legs up, squeeze hamstrings

name: Nordic Curl
instructions: Knees on pad, lower body forward with control, push back up

name: Good Morning
instructions: Bar on shoulders, hip hinge forward, return to standing

name: Barbell Hip Thrust
instructions: Upper back on bench, drive hips up, squeeze glutes at top

name: Leg Press (High Foot)
instructions: Place feet high on platform, focus on glute activation

name: Cable Kickback
instructions: Attach ankle strap, kick back, squeeze glutes

name: Smith Machine Squat
instructions: Feet forward, squat with machine bar

name: Standing Calf Raise
instructions: Rise onto toes, lower down, high reps for calves

name: Seated Calf Raise
instructions: Sit in machine, raise heels, emphasizes soleus

name: Leg Press Calf Raise
instructions: Only move at ankles, press toes up on leg press

name: Plank Hold
instructions: Hold body straight, engage core, don't let hips sag

name: Ab Wheel Rollout
instructions: Kneel, roll wheel out, pull back with core

name: Hanging Leg Raise
instructions: Hang from bar, raise legs to horizontal, lower with control

name: Cable Crunch
instructions: Kneel with cable, crunch down, feel abs contract

name: Russian Twist
instructions: Sit back, hold weight, rotate side to side

name: Cable Wood Chop
instructions: Stand sideways, rotate cable from high to low

name: Diamond Push-Up
instructions: Hands together forming diamond, lower chest to hands

name: Chest Dips
instructions: Lean forward, lower body, push up with chest

name: Pec Deck Fly
instructions: Sit, elbows on pads, bring arms together in arc

name: Landmine Press
instructions: Hold barbell end, press upward in arc motion

name: Svend Press
instructions: Hold plate between palms, press out and squeeze

name: Pull-Up
instructions: Hang from bar, pull body up until chin over bar

name: Chin-Up
instructions: Underhand grip, pull up until chin clears bar

name: Pendlay Row
instructions: Bent over, explosively row barbell to chest from floor

name: Yates Row
instructions: Underhand grip, slight torso angle, row to lower chest

name: T-Bar Row
instructions: Straddle bar, bent over, row with both hands

name: Inverted Row
instructions: Hang under bar, pull chest to bar, squeeze shoulder blades

name: Rack Pull
instructions: Barbell on pins, deadlift from knee height

name: Seal Row
instructions: Lie chest down on high bench, row barbell up

name: Standing Overhead Press
instructions: Stand, press bar from shoulders overhead

name: Arnold Press
instructions: Start palms facing you, rotate as you press overhead

name: Cable Lateral Raise
instructions: Stand sideways to cable, raise arm laterally

name: Upright Row
instructions: Narrow grip, pull bar up to chest height

name: Reverse Pec Deck
instructions: Face machine, pull handles backward

name: Bradford Press
instructions: Press from front to back of head alternating

name: Close Grip Bench Press
instructions: Narrow grip, lower to chest, press up focusing on triceps

name: Triceps Dips
instructions: Stay upright, lower body, extend arms fully

name: Skull Crusher
instructions: Lie back, lower bar to forehead, extend arms

name: Overhead Tricep Extension
instructions: Hold dumbbell overhead, lower behind head, extend

name: Rope Tricep Extension
instructions: High cable, pull rope down, flare ends apart

name: Dumbbell Kickback
instructions: Bent over, extend arm back, squeeze tricep

name: JM Press
instructions: Hybrid skull crusher and close grip bench motion

name: Preacher Curl
instructions: Arms on pad, curl bar up, squeeze at top

name: Spider Curl
instructions: Chest on incline bench, curl dumbbells up

name: Incline Dumbbell Curl
instructions: Sit on incline, let arms hang, curl with full stretch

name: Drag Curl
instructions: Drag bar up body keeping elbows back

name: Barbell 21s
instructions: 7 bottom half reps, 7 top half, 7 full reps

name: Reverse Curl
instructions: Overhand grip, curl bar up focusing on forearms

name: Front Squat
instructions: Bar on front shoulders, squat down, drive up

name: Hack Squat
instructions: Shoulders under pads, squat down, drive through heels

name: Bulgarian Split Squat
instructions: Back foot elevated, lunge down on front leg

name: Walking Lunge
instructions: Step forward into lunge, alternate legs walking

name: Sissy Squat
instructions: Lean back, knees forward, lower body focusing on quads

name: Goblet Squat
instructions: Hold dumbbell at chest, squat deep, drive up

name: Romanian Deadlift
instructions: Hinge at hips, lower bar down legs, feel hamstring stretch

name: Good Morning
instructions: Bar on back, hinge forward at hips, return upright

name: Glute Ham Raise
instructions: Lock feet, lower body, pull back up with hamstrings

name: Single Leg Curl
instructions: One leg at a time, curl up, squeeze hamstring

name: Nordic Curl
instructions: Kneel, slowly lower body forward, catch yourself

name: Barbell Hip Thrust
instructions: Back on bench, bar on hips, thrust up squeezing glutes

name: Cable Glute Kickback
instructions: Ankle strap, kick leg back, squeeze glute at top

name: Sumo Deadlift
instructions: Wide stance, toes out, deadlift focusing on glutes

name: Curtsy Lunge
instructions: Cross leg behind and back, lunge down

name: Frog Pump
instructions: Lie back, soles together, thrust hips up

name: Seated Calf Raise
instructions: Sit, weight on knees, raise heels high

name: Donkey Calf Raise
instructions: Bent over, hips loaded, raise up on toes

name: Single Leg Calf Raise
instructions: One leg, hold dumbbell, raise up on toes

name: Bicycle Crunch
instructions: Alternate elbow to opposite knee in cycling motion

name: Dragon Flag
instructions: Hold bench, raise entire body, lower with control

name: Weighted Crunch
instructions: Hold plate on chest, crunch up, squeeze abs

name: Side Plank
instructions: On side, elbow down, hold body straight

name: Pallof Press
instructions: Stand sideways, press cable away, resist rotation
